985150.name: Scuba's Ocean Odyssey VR
985150.description: Scuba's Ocean Odyssey is an underwater adventure that follows the fictional story of Scuba the Submersible, based on actual situations in the oceans today. Explore through different areas in the ocean and meet all kinds of sea creatures to learn about how the pollution affects them. Salvage trash and use it to craft items that help you in your missions and find the source of the garbage, as well as Scuba's origin.
985150.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
